Column Comment.0: JURISDICTION: The unique id for the business association who has jurisdictionalauthority over the land sale.
Column Comment.1: LAND SALE NUMBER: A unique identifier for the land sale
Column Comment.2: LAND SALE OFFERING ID: Unique identifier for the land sale offering record.
Column Comment.3: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.4: LAND OFFER CANCEL REASON: reason why the land sale offering was removedfrom the land sale, such as withdrawn, no bids, no acceptable bids.
Column Comment.5: EFFECTIVE DATE: The date that the data in this row first came into effect.
Column Comment.6: EXPIRY DATE: The date that the data in this row was no longer active or in effect.
Column Comment.7: GROSS SIZE: Total amount of land measured in hectares/acres in the offering(parcel)
Column Comment.8: GROSS SIZE UOM: Usually hectares or acres
Column Comment.9: INACTIVATION DATE: The date that the land parcel offering is inactivated. Theoffering may be re-posted at a future date.
Column Comment.10: R LAND OFFRING STATUS: The status of this offerning, such as postponed,cancelled, withdrawn, active, sold, not sold.
Column Comment.11: LAND OFFERING TYPE: state, indian, federal, BLM, first nations, provincial, OCS,crown
Column Comment.12: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.13: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.14: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.15: STATUS DATE: Date associated with the most current parcel status.
Column Comment.16: TERM DURATION: The term length that is associated with the land parcel (e.g. 6months, 5 years, etc.)
Column Comment.17: TERM DURATION OUOM: Original units, usually days, months or years.
Column Comment.18: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.19: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.20: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.21: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.22: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.23: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.24: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
